parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: Callback
parameters.description: The URL that is used to receive callback notifications about snapshot capturing.

parameters.name: OssBucket
parameters.description: The name of the OSS bucket in which the snapshots are stored.

parameters.name: OverwriteOssObject
parameters.description:
The name of the OSS object, which is to be overwritten each time when a snapshot is captured.

*   The name must be less than 256 bytes in length.
*   Only JPG files are supported.
*   The name can contain variables, such as {AppName} and {StreamName}.

parameters.name: SequenceOssObject
parameters.description:
The name of the OSS object, which increments each time when a snapshot is captured. You can call the [DescribeLiveStreamSnapshotInfo](~~44797~~) operation to query OSS objects of a specified period.

*   The name must be less than 256 bytes in length.
*   Only JPG files are supported.
*   The name can contain variables, such as {AppName}, {StreamName}, {UnixTimestamp}, and {Sequence}. You must specify one of {UnixTimestamp} and {Sequence}.

parameters.name: TimeInterval
parameters.description: The intervals at which the snapshots are captured. Unit: seconds. Valid values: **5 to 3600**.
